secret-name.help: Name of the secret name. It can be a list.

token.help: Personal Access Token to authenticate on GitHub.

token-file.help: Path to file to read Personal Access Token to authenticate on GitHub.

env-file.help: Path to INI file to extract secrets information. --secret-name and other screts values flag are ignored.

value-from-file.help: Path to file containing secret values. If multiple secrets names are set, the corresponding value has to be separated by lines.
